page.title: 05SQUARE ISLAND,PEMBROKE.
page.content: { Square Island }is a name given to a small group of houses,cottages and a farm.It is about half way up Bowett Hill about 1\ miles outside Pembroke. Over the weekend I usually ride up Bowett Hill to Square Island to my friends house. He keeps a chicken and some geese but my friend and I catch roach down at the Decoy Ponds and put them in it. Sometimes we ride up to the shop in Hundleton to buy some sweets. At the back of his house is a corn field which we walk through to get to our tree house.We have made a rope swing.Sometimes we walk through the woods looking for good places to put a rope swing.
